definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
healthy/to invigorate/to strengthen/to be good at/to be strong in

sentences.english: Prescription drugs represent only about one-tenth of all health care spending in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 處方藥僅佔美國醫療保健費用的十分之一。

sentences.english: Nurse Yaima Milian examines a patient at Baptist Health of South Florida in Miami Health care is one-sixth of the economy.
sentences.chinese: 醫療保健佔據整個經濟的六分之一。

sentences.english: The other major downside is with the new health care plan that's being implemented.
sentences.chinese: 其他的缺點就是關於新的醫療保健計劃的實施。

sentences.english: Most of his work has focused on health care.
sentences.chinese: 金永吉的大部分工作經驗集中在醫療保健領域。

sentences.english: People who are stateless often have no right to schooling or health care.
sentences.chinese: 無國籍的人往往沒有教育或醫療保健的權利。

sentences.english: Be widely applied in medical and health care area, as well as toiletry field.
sentences.chinese: 被廣泛應用於醫療保健和化妝品行業。

sentences.english: However, the most emotional part of the evening was devoted to health care.
sentences.chinese: 不過當晚最使人動感情的演講都是關於醫療保健的。

sentences.english: Medicare is the name of Canada’s "single-payer" health care system.
sentences.chinese: 醫療保險是指加拿大的“統一支付方”醫療保健系統。

sentences.english: Much of this greenery could also save money.
sentences.chinese: 多數情況下這種醫療保健的綠化方式亦可以省錢。

sentences.english: All I can do is make sure Marti doesn't need medical care.
sentences.chinese: 唯一我能做的，只是確定瑪蒂需不需要醫療保健。

sentences.english: American Health Care Appraisal - medical equipment appraisal and business valuation, specializing in hospitals and healthcare organizations.
sentences.chinese: 向醫院和醫療保健機構提供醫療設備信息。

sentences.english: At the same time, the baby boomer generation is aging and requiring health care.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，嬰兒潮一代正在老去，需要醫療保健。

sentences.english: Health care is one-sixth of the economy.
sentences.chinese: 醫療保健佔據整個經濟的六分之一。

sentences.english: In Japan, most people are covered by the public health-care system.
sentences.chinese: 在日本，大多數人都享有公共醫療保健系統的福利。

sentences.english: Nothing illuminates this more clearly than health care.
sentences.chinese: 沒有比醫療保健更能清楚地說明這。

sentences.english: As he put it in the Rose Garden, we have to change the health-care system.
sentences.chinese: 按照他在玫瑰園所言，我們必須改變醫療保健系統。

definition: public utility/state-run enterprise/public foundation or enterprise, often charitable
private business/opposite: state-owned enterprise 國有企業|国有企业[guo2 you3 qi3 ye4]
